actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to House from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, H. Rept. 93-719.
Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Armed Services with amendment, S. Rept. 93-840.

official_title: An Act to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the presentation of a flag of the United States for deceased members of the Ready Reserve and for deceased members of the Reserve who die after completing twenty years of service, but before becoming entitled to retired pay.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides for the presentation of a flag of the United States to the person designated to direct the disposition of the remains of a deceased member of the Ready Reserve of the Armed Forces; or to a reservist who had performed at least 20 years of service but who was not entitled to retired pay.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the preservation of a flag of the United States for deceased members of the National Guard and Selected Reserve.

An Act to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for the presentation of a flag of the United States for deceased members of the Ready Reserve and for deceased members of the Reserve who die after completing twenty years of service, but before becoming entitled to retired pay.
